welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marco Island, where the warm sun and beautiful beaches await you. Known for its charming atmosphere and stunning scenery, we invite you to discover the hidden gems of our city and create unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Island Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Marco Island Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Naples Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Naples Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
